text: James R. "Jim" Bede (17 April 1933 - 9 July 2015) was an American aircraft designer. He designed well over a dozen aircraft since the 1960s, but a string of business failures have kept most of these designs out of widespread use. Bede died of an aneurysm in Cleveland, Ohio, aged 82. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from aneurysm Category:People from Cleveland
title: Jim Bede
